item.description:
UPDATED JUNE 9, 2012

Ok, so I think we've narrowed it down to Miller's Ale House in Watertown and Dillons on Boylston, but the best choice, I think, seems to be Miller's. It has less blaring music, better prices, and WAY more parking.

I dont want people to feel pressured to order food or stay longer than they intended. So a casual atmosphere is definitely best, as well as cheap drinks! Miller's Ale House in Watertown has a great atmostphere, a casual dining experience, cheap food/drinks, FREE parking, and dining coupons available online! Its a little bit off of the T, but if you're comfortable with the bus ride to Watertown mall or the short drive down Arsenal, we'd love to see you there!!

You can grab a drink and sit to chat, order some of their infamous wings (so I've heard) or stay & order a $12.99 steak special. So I think it's pretty reasonable.

And maybe next time we can do something that is a bit more "sit-down" formal.

MEET: INSIDE AT BAR - we will have a sign on the table!

WHEN: 715-730 on June 16 - We'll probably stay until about 9pm or so, depending.

Thoughts, objections, suggestions, comments?
item.name: grab Dinner/Drinks
